channel.title: SIO on air-sea modeling lab, yonsei university

item.title: Visit to Scripps Institution of Oceanography
item.description: Hajoon visited Bruce Cornuelle and Art Miller at Scripps Institution of Oceanography in February, 2020. The main purpose of the visit is to set up the WRF-MITgcm coupled model over the northwest Pacific. It was good to be back and meet amazing people there. This visit was possible through the support from Korea Research Foundation (신진연구).
